title: City Vamps
description: Washed up reality star Maggie Shaw clings to Jack Daniel’s for dear life until her agent lands Maggie the role of a lifetime in the cast of City Vamps, the popular sitcom about five single immortals living in New York City. If Maggie survives her stint in rehab and stays sober, she will prove herself as a serious actress. But before she can be accepted as a full-fledged member of the cast, Maggie must decide how far she’s willing to go to keep the limelight shining on her when she learns that not all of her co-stars are acting.
author: Danny  Fisher
